attributes.action: Give more help to children with mental health problems
attributes.background:
Children with mental health issues don’t always find the help they need is available to them, so they then feel trapped.
This needs to stop.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about mental health, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/275106
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/260373
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270034
